summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Park Commissioners to acquire by private purchase all those portions of Tract Sixteen (16) and Tract Eighteen (18), Seattle Homestead Association Five Acre Tracts, lying between the west margin of Twenty-fourth Avenue South, produced, the east margin of Twenty-third Avenue South, produced, the north margin of Grand Street, produced, and the south margin of Massachusetts Street, produced; all of which marginal lines are established by Ordinance No. 23038 of the City of Seattle, approved January 18, 1910; for Park and Parkway purposes, for a sum not to exceed Five Thousand One and 27/100 Dollars ($5,001.27).
